mapper.select: SELECT M.MENU_CD, M.MENU_NM, M.SRC_PATH, F.CREATED_DATE FROM (SELECT M.MENU_CD, M.MENU_NM, P.SRC_PATH FROM BM_MENU M, BM_PROGRAM P WHERE M.PROGRAM_CD = P.PROGRAM_CD AND M.IS_USE = 'Y' AND P.IS_USE = 'Y') M, (SELECT EMP_CD, MENU_CD, CREATED_DATE FROM BM_FAVORITE WHERE EMP_CD = #{EMP_CD}) F WHERE F.MENU_CD = M.MENU_CD ORDER BY M.MENU_NM
